cd ~/.../python/Study/
less ~/.cookiecutters/cookiecutter-pypackage-minimal/cookiecutter.json

{
    "author_name": "Sergio Tarquini",
    "author_email": "starq69@mail.com",

    "package_name": "autogenerated", <-- "z_hacks"
    "package_version": "0.1.0",
    "package_description":todo",    <--- "zipline bundles hacks"
    "package_url":"",
    "readme_pypi_badge": false,
    "readme_travis_badge": false,
    "readme_travis_url":""
}

cookiecutter cookiecutter-pypackage-minimal
cd z_hacks/
git init .
git add *
git add .gitignore 
git commit -m 'cookiecutter generated'

create "z_hacks" github repo

git remote add origin https://github.com/starq69/z_hacks.git
git push -u origin master
